dialogue.text: ..Mabye we did too much spooky dancing..
YOU'RE AN INSANE-
A-are you okay?!?!?!?!
Oh thank god.....\nI'm still here...
What happened???
I-I don't know\nBut I am scared shitless.
P-pardon my french children
W..what were you ''scared'' of?...
I don't know.\nHe would constantly stare at me with their giant eyeball..
They would ramble on about nothing...just a bunch of thoughts pouring out of their mouth...
That smile...\nStill gives me the chills.
I-I'm sorry, but I think we're gonna go home kids..
That's okay!\nJust make sure he gets lots of rest!
I probably won't.
But thank you for considering, children.
And Happy Spooky Month.
Now if you excuse me, I'm gonna go home and have a heart attack..
Man, am I glad to be out of there...\n...\n...Whats with the cute ass blushing?
O-oh nothing..\nI was um...wondering if you'd acompany me for thanksgiving..
*Among Us Sound* \nThat'd be lovely.
Sweet...
..So...Getting home wise, where am I taking you?
Think I'm gonna go to my place...
Can you um......\n...spend the night???
I c-can only spend a few hours there....\n..I promised my Mother that I would be back\nby midnight...
But I would love to if I could..
Wanna like...call me when you get home.\nCause I probably might be scared being left alone in my big....
....empty....house...
...You okay?...
...It just gets lonely in there sometimes...\n...And I know that its been getting better now that we've been texting wayyy more now but...
...I don't even know...I just really wish that I can move on...
...Baby...I know that you're trying really, really hard to bounce back from everything\nthat was thrown at you earlier this year..
...And I'm so proud of you for doing that.\nAnd ever since I gathered the courage to tell you my feelings for you,
Feelings that I've had for you since the eight grade..
...You've started to become happy again..\nI haven't seen you THIS happy in so long...
I REALLY love it when you feel good about yourself...fills ME with joy knowing that..
I-I wanna move in w-with you at some point this year...I don't want you to feel lonely ANYMORE.
You can talk to me ANYTIME okay?\nI'm free tommorow...s-so if you want to do something together, don't be afraid to ask!
...I love you more than anything in the world. I wanna plan a fun day for us tommorow.
...And then go back to being miserable because we have work the next day. I hate it when people get Mayonaise on thier sandwich.
Ewwwww....
But tonight, we cuddle on the couch and watch a show.\nOf your choice of course...
I'll um...think about some options...
Sounds good...
